data.title: PwC Office in Armenia
data.meta_description: PwC has been serving clients in Armenia since 1996, and in September 2007, opened an office in Yerevan which now employs close to 30 professional staff.
data.text:
PwC has been serving clients in Armenia since 1996 and in September 2007 opened an office in Yerevan.

The local knowledge and expertise coupled with a diverse experience of the PwC global network allow us to deliver tailored solutions to complex business issues in the Armenian environment. One of our missions is to bring the proven international experience into Armenia and to make our contribution in the development of Armenian business and business environment. We use our knowledge, experience and thinking to deliver solutions and create business perspectives.

The office personnel include national and international experts in assurance, business processes and risk assurance. Team of PwC Armenia is well positioned to service all aspects of the potential business environment.

PwC Armenia currently has a team of about 40 assurance, tax, legal and consulting professionals.
